snippet.title: Battlezone: Gold Edition - Announcement Trailer | PC, Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One
snippet.description:
Battlezone Gold Edition is coming!

Jump into the cockpit of the most powerful tank in the galaxy and battle the maniacal Corporation ravaging Earth across a procedurally-generated campaign for 1-4 players. Playable with or without a VR headset, and available as a FREE update to Battlezone owners.


Find us on our social media pages for updates and excitement:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BattlezoneGold/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BattlezoneVR
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com
